heroDesc: Advanced computer systems student and self-taught programmer.
aboutMeDesc: Being enthusiastic about technology from a young age has always driven me to continuously learn new tools. I started programming in high school, from which I graduated as a Computer Technician. Currently, at 22 years old, I am in my third year of studying for a degree in IT, and in my free time, I am constantly learning, whether it be through self-teaching or taking courses, about the latest technological innovations.
name: Your name
